mapper.select: select id, name, description, url, requestParams, requestHeader, responseHeader, status, method, userId, createTime, updateTime, isDelete from interface_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into interface_info(name, description, url, requestParams, requestHeader, responseHeader, status, method, userId, createTime, updateTime, isDelete) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{url}, #{requestparams}, #{requestheader}, #{responseheader}, #{status}, #{method}, #{userid}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{isdelete})

insert into interface_info(name, description, url, requestParams, requestHeader, responseHeader, status, method, userId, createTime, updateTime, isDelete) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.requestparams}, #{entity.requestheader}, #{entity.responseheader}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.isdelete})

insert into interface_info(name, description, url, requestParams, requestHeader, responseHeader, status, method, userId, createTime, updateTime, isDelete) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.requestparams}, #{entity.requestheader}, #{entity.responseheader}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.isdelete})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), description = values(description), url = values(url), requestParams = values(requestParams), requestHeader = values(requestHeader), responseHeader = values(responseHeader), status = values(status), method = values(method), userId = values(userId), createTime = values(createTime), updateTime = values(updateTime), isDelete = values(isDelete)
mapper.update:
update interface_info
name = #{name},
description = #{description},
url = #{url},
requestParams = #{requestparams},
requestHeader = #{requestheader},
responseHeader = #{responseheader},
status = #{status},
method = #{method},
userId = #{userid},
createTime = #{createtime},
updateTime = #{updatetime},
isDelete = #{isdelete},
where id = #{id}
